Documentation: Is the unique identification of a client.
Optional reference number for the order from the system partner.
ID of the LU. Used in case of IG or replenishment.
Unique identification of a loading aid (see LoadAid).

Unique identification of a partner object.

If set LU must be diverted to final check station.
